import React from "react"; class ExtraCities extends React.Component{ state={stopsSelected:[]} render(){

Before we depart, are there any specific places you want to stop along the way?

{e.preventDefault()}}>
{props.setSearch(e.target.value,'startCity')}} name="startpoint" placeholder="Starting City"/> {props.setSearch(e.target.value,'startCountry')}} name="startCountry" placeholder="Starting Country"/>
{props.endPointSubmit(e)}}/>
} } export default ExtraCities /*

Your trip will take you ${distance} miles, start to finish!


Before we depart, are there any specific places you want to stop along the way?


Note: Destination must be reasonable in order to be added to itinerary. (Ex. If trip is from Japan to China, stopping in Brazil will not be possible)

*/
